name: reveal-glass
short_effect: Switches Tornadus, Thundurus, and Landorus between Incarnate and Therian Forme.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A looking glass that reveals the truth. It’s a mysterious glass that returns a Pokémon to its original shape.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A looking glass that reveals the truth. It’s a mysterious glass that returns a Pokémon to its original shape.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A looking glass that reveals the truth. It’s a mysterious glass that returns a Pokémon to its original shape.
